Traits.Name: Junk Armor
Traits.Description: The first time the Junk Mage is damaged by an attack or ability in a combat, reduce all damage to 0 and summon 2 valuables tokens in spaces in range 2 from them.

Actions.Name: Animate Valuable
Actions.Description: The Junk Mage chooses a character in range 8. That character takes 2 piercing damage for each loose valuables token in range 3 of them.
